itemInfo.itemDesc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used in Cooking.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Butchering a worm corpse.

item.name: Rare Jerky
item.desc: A dried meat snack useful for long journeys.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying Butchered Meat.\n- It increases HP slightly when used.
